data.name: XViewSplitable
desc: enables a SpreadsheetView to split the view.

methods.name: getIsWindowSplit
desc: returns TRUE if the view is split into individual panes.
Only one of XViewSplitable.getIsWindowSplit() and XViewFreezable.hasFrozenPanes() can be TRUE.

methods.name: getSplitColumn
desc: returns the column before which the view is split.

methods.name: getSplitHorizontal
desc: returns the horizontal position in pixels where the view is split.

methods.name: getSplitRow
desc: returns the row before which the view is split.

methods.name: getSplitVertical
desc: returns the vertical position in pixels where the view is split.

methods.name: splitAtPosition
desc: splits the view at the specified position.
To split only horizontally, specify nPixelY as 0. To split only vertically, specify nPixelX as 0.
